item.title: These stocks are forming the dreaded ‘death cross,’ including one major AI tech play
item.description: Microsoft is one stock that could soon form the ominous 'death cross,' signaling to investors potential weakness.

item.title: Income investors can find dividends and outperformance in the same corner of the market

item.title: There's another reason why bitcoin is trailing gold and not acting as a safe haven

item.title: This oil driller's stock shows a favorable trend in a strong sector and has momentum at its back
item.description: Momentum indicators in both the RSI and MACD flashed buy signals and are not in overbought territory. There's room to run.

item.title: Broadcom CEO told TD Cowen analysts there's insatiable demand for its chips
item.description: The investment bank reiterated its bullish $450 price target on Broadcom shares after hosting a meeting with the company's CEO.
